definition: to drill/to bore/to get into/to make one's way into/to enter (a hole)/to thread one's way through/to study intensively/to dig into/to curry favor for personal gain
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
lit. fifth child of the Wangs/bachelor
"Mr Perfect" (i.e. tall, rich and handsome) (Internet slang)
children of entrepreneurs who became wealthy under Deng Xiaoping's economic reforms in the 1980s/see also 窮二代|穷二代[qiong2 er4 dai4]
"Ms Perfect" (i.e. fair-skinned, rich and beautiful) (Internet slang)
to be successful in business/professional success
